docs.snippet: The marriage of Mary Nan Pandjiris, merchandise director of Seventeen magazine, to Oscar S. Pollock, a limited partner in the stock-brokerage firm of Ingalls  Snyder, took place in the Our Lady Chapel at St. Thomas More's Roman Catholic Church in ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The marriage of Mary Nan Pandjiris, merchandise director of Seventeen magazine, to Oscar S. Pollock, a limited partner in the stock-brokerage firm of Ingalls Snyder, took place in the Our Lady Chapel at St. Thomas More's Roman Catholic Church in New York yesterday afternoon. Msgr. James G. Wilders performed the ceremony.

headline.main: Nan Pandjiris Is Wed To Oscar S. Pollock

docs.snippet: The 11-year-old daughter of Calvin Klein, one of the nation's foremost fashion designers, was kidnapped on Manhattan's Upper East Side yesterday morning and released unharmed more than nine hours later after her father paid a $100,000 ransom, the ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The 11-year-old daughter of Calvin Klein, one of the nation's foremost fashion designers, was kidnapped on Manhattan's Upper East Side yesterday morning and released unharmed more than nine hours later after her father paid a $100,000 ransom, the Federal Bureau of Investigation said last night. The abductors escaped.

headline.main: Calvin Klein's Child Abducted, Then Freed for $100,000; Designer's Child Is Abducted, Freed
